title: Stadionul Comunal (Alparea)
text: Stadionul Comunal is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="O%C8%99orhei">Alparea</a>, <a href="Romania">Romania</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="CS%20O%C8%99orhei">CS Oșorhei</a>. The stadium holds 1,000 people.
